title: Game crashed 3/4 through winning a ranked game.

embed.description: Imgur: full of all the magic and wonders of the Internet.

body:
Hi all, not sure if i'm posting in the correct section for this issue. I'm not interested in wasting more time trying to go through FAQ's that don't resolve .... all.
Game crashed while my team was annihilating in a ranked game. Nothing to do with anything on my end... I know this, beacause;
1. The in game clock was still running and the voice was still saying the enemy inhibitors were respawning soon.. (Not my computer).
2. I Alt tabbed and loaded various sites & games without lag or connection issues at all. (Not my connection or firewall).
3. All the other characters on the screen (Friendly $ Enemy) had frozen in place. Also, after a while.. The champions started twitch glitching on the spot. (League of legends issue).

After attempting to reconnect several times, it just leads me back at the same window.. Prompting me a reconnect because I? I left a game.. Cough.
After attempting to log in again it still leads me back at that window.. It's been a few hours now.

I was in a series trial too.. Typicaly, I would guess this'll count as a loss - I will not be awarded my win and I will just have ta 'suck it up, princess'.

THANKS!

replies.body: If you are wanting help to try and prevent future problems you should detail what happened when you tried to reconnect.
